title: my champion in game movements are way less smooth.
body:
so before the 7.6 patch everything was fine then i got on league updated it and now i am getting some frame skipping. i tried going into borderless i tried updating my graphics card driver. when ever i go back and forth it gets really bad. tried turning off movement prediction. i uncapped my fps but it only helped a little bit. my fps is now capped at 60. i have a pretty good desktop i get 59-60 ping (usually always) pls help or fix in next patch.

thank you

replies.body:
It sounds like what you're describing could be caused by packet loss. We can find out for sure if you take your most recent game logs and throw those into our [**Connection Log Reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader). 

Take a screenshot of what the log reader spits out and send it my way, then we'll be able to see what's going on.

I don't think its packet loss. It just started last patch and has never happened to me. But how could I send them to you? It was working fine last week and then i updated it and now this is happening. I saw something about frame skipping that u guys posted. but i'm just wondering if you guys are going to fix it next patch? And if not how i can fix it. 

here is the thing that u guys posted 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs

thanks

Since you've already checked the steps there (and I'm assuming you used our log reader and it said you had 0% packet loss) it would probably be best to reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look into your issue.
its when ever my champion is not moving and i give a command to move the surroundings freeze. it only happens on lock screen
